typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as string,
		lpep_pickup_datetime as string,
		Lpep_dropoff_datetime as string,
		Store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		RateCodeID as string,
		Pickup_longitude as string,
		Pickup_latitude as string,
		Dropoff_longitude as string,
		Dropoff_latitude as string,
		Passenger_count as string,
		Trip_distance as string,
		Fare_amount as string,
		Extra as string,
		MTA_tax as string,
		Tip_amount as string,
		Tolls_amount as string,
		Ehail_fee as string,
		Total_amount as string,
		Payment_type as string,
		{Trip_type } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		VendorID,
		lpep_pickup_datetime,
		Lpep_dropoff_datetime,
		Store_and_fwd_flag,
		RateCodeID,
		Pickup_longitude,
		Pickup_latitude,
		Dropoff_longitude,
		Dropoff_latitude,
		Passenger_count,
		Trip_distance,
		Fare_amount,
		Extra,
		MTA_tax,
		Tip_amount,
		Tolls_amount,
		Ehail_fee,
		Total_amount,
		Payment_type,
		Trip_Type = {Trip_type }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
